input.sentences: on the third day of our visit | we decided to head to a new museum on the other side of the city .
the building was tall and brand new compared to the other buildings in that area .
since it was a weekday | there were no lines | so we could walk right in .
a modern art exhibit was the highlight as you can see by this giant car made of paper .
we ended the museum tour just after noon and we were ready for a late lunch .
output.sentences: The family went on vacation and had to cross a large bridge.
They came to the building which was very tall.
Not many people had showed up yet.
They seen a card made out of cardboard.
Then it was time to go home.
